message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do a bit better than my previous offer, but I need to make a profit. How about $105?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
